message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal for you, as you know the value is even higher. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is higher, but I am only willing to pay up to $13,000 for it. Please let me know if this is possible.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  $13,500 is my best price right now, considering the product's value.  Let's see if we can find a compromise.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $13,200. This is the highest I can go while still staying within my budget.
